comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: That's Wilmoth Houdini (1895-1973); aka "King Houdini," born Frederick Wilmoth Hendricks in Trinidad. Hear him sing "Black but Sweet" here; video features an image of him wearing this same costume, same curtain in background: www.youtube.com/watch?v=8QkqbKD1Lxo
